text: Ezɨ Iesus gumazir 12plan kaba amaga akar kam me ganɨga ghaze, “Ia Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bagh mangan markɨ. Egh Samarian nguibar ekiabar mangan markɨ.10:5 Kar Iesusɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar ruarir mam, Namba 2. Akar sapta 10:5-42ɨn itiba, da suren gumaziba Godɨn akam akun darutɨma arazir me bativamibav gei.
